query.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '122' ,CS122_PJT AS PJT ,CS122_HNO AS HNO ,CS101_HNA AS HNA ,ZSPEC1 AS SPEC1 ,ZSPEC2 AS SPEC2 ,'' AS STATUS ,'' AS UPN ,'' AS CST ,'' AS ISR ,'' AS CHECK FROM SAPHEE.ZCST122 ,SAPHEE.ZCST111 ,SAPHEE.ZCST101 ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE CS122_UPN = #UPN# AND CS122_UPN = UPN AND CS122_CST = CST AND CS122_PJT = CS101_PJT AND CS122_HNO = CS101_HNO AND CS122_PJT||CS122_HNO = POSID_1 UNION SELECT '123' ,CS123_PJT AS PJT ,CS123_HNO AS HNO ,CS101_HNA AS HNA ,ZSPEC1 AS SPEC1 ,ZSPEC2 AS SPEC2 ,'¿äÃ»' AS STATUS ,CS123_UPN AS UPN ,CS123_CST AS CST ,CS123_ISR AS ISR ,'' AS CHECK FROM SAPHEE.ZCST123 ,SAPHEE.ZCST101 ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE CS123_UPN = #UPN# AND CS123_CGB = '' AND CS123_PJT = CS101_PJT AND CS123_HNO = CS101_HNO AND CS123_PJT||CS123_HNO = POSID_1 ) AS A ORDER BY PJT,HNO WITH UR
